info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 2:54AM CDT until May 17 at 10:43AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Grand River Near Little Eagle affecting Corson County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Grand River near Little Eagle.
* WHEN...From early this morning to late this morning.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Low-lying pasture and hay land along the river begins to flood
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:31 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:31 AM MDT Saturday was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near steady through the early morning before falling. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon.this morning at 945 AM MDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS MORNING
